title: r/Prorevenge I Tricked My Douchebag Neighbor And Stole His House!
description:
r/Prorevenge In today's episode, OP lives on a small piece of property that his parents gave him. A new neighbor moves in to the house next door, and it turns out that he's a complete and total douchebag who gives OP trouble for years. Eventually, OP has had enough of his neighbor's antics and decides to get some delicious prororevenge by tricking the neighbor into selling him his house for only 25% of its market value. If you like this podcast and want to see more, follow my podcast for more daily Reddit content!
